context: Spotify went public via direct listing in April 2018. The company had 170M monthly active users and was the global leader in music streaming, investing in podcasts.

competitors.name: Amazon Music
competitors.notes: Streaming bundled with Prime and Echo devices

competitors.name: YouTube Music
competitors.notes: Google's music streaming replacing Google Play Music

competitors.name: Pandora
competitors.notes: Internet radio service transitioning to on-demand

competitors.name: SoundCloud
competitors.notes: Platform for independent artists and DJs
